segments.text: Hey , Steven . What are you going to do this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If the weather is good , I'll go to climb mountains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going with your friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . For me , mountaineering is both relaxation and a hobby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think mountaineering is an exciting sport , but a little dangerous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you are right , but it's really interesting .
segments.speaker: S2
